title: Why did the Braves release Jose Bautista?
content: When Alex Anthopoulos brought Jose Bautista to the Atlanta Braves he was hoping he’d be their starting third baseman for the rest of the season. “The staff collectively felt that Camargo should be the guy to play everyday,” he said. Once Anthopoulos knew he was going with the younger option, he sat down with Bautista.
